goal: Post-login chatbot → redirect members to website pages; for resort features, always include the resort link.

booking_link.Description: Just a seven-minute walk from the pristine silver sands of Cavelossim Beach, this charming and vibrant resort offers everything you need to embrace the Goan way of life.
booking_link.label: Search & Book Karma Group - Karma Club

resort_link.label: Karma Royal Haathi Mahal, Goa, India - Karma Club

features.title: Accommodation
features.description: Your home throughout your stay in Karma Royal Haathi Mahal is in one of 65 spacious hotel rooms with private balconies – or check into one of our 80 fully-equipped Members only apartments, dotted throughout the beautiful landscaped gardens.

features.title: Cuisine
features.description: You will be spoilt for choice when it comes to dining at Karma Royal Haathi Mahal. Our English pub named after the late Mark Attwood, our co-founder and former Sales & Marketing Director of Karma Royal Group, offers traditional English pub grub.

features.title: Facilities
features.description: From the moment you rise from your well-deserved slumber each day you are faced with a feast of opportunities for entertainment, relaxation and adventure.

booking_link.Description: A modern resort hotel situated in the heart of Manali facing the pristine Kullu valley amidst towering cedar trees and snow capped mountain peaks in the distance. Walking distance from the 15th century Hadimba Devi temple.
booking_link.label: Book Karma Utopia

features.title: Accommodation
features.description: Well appointed rooms with all modern comforts including hot and cold air conditioning, wooden flooring, Victornian style furniture, plush beds and magnificent views. Amenities include electric kettles, mini refrigerators, large wardrobes and 43 inch LED TVs.

features.title: Cuisine
features.description: Himachali Cuisine is a reflection of the region’s rich culture and tradition – from the Kangri Dhaam – an array of local dishes cooked in copper pots usually on special occasions, to the humble ‘siddu’ – a steamed bun stuffed with minced walnuts and local vegetables. Seasonal ingredients play a major role in local cuisine.

features.title: Facilities
features.description: Resort facilities include a 50 cover all day dining restaurant and a swimming pool.
